questions.title: 我可以再你一些问题吗？
questions.answer: May I ask you any other questions?

questions.title: 我能邀请你所有的家人来我的生日聚会吗？
questions.answer: May I ask all your families to come to my birthday party?

questions.title: 我可以知道你们公司有谁来参观我们的工厂吗？
questions.answer: May I ask who will visit our factory in your company?

questions.title: 既然这样了，我可以知道你是否会跳舞吗？
questions.answer: It's done now, may I ask if you candance?

questions.title: 无论怎样，我都想知道你会成为我的女朋友吗？
questions.answer: Whatever it takes, may I ask you if you will be my girlfriend?

title: ——我可以约你出去吗？
——对不起，我的日程已经排满了。
——我可否问问你是做什么工作的？
——我经营着一家科技公司。

answer.en: May I ask you what business you're in?
I'm in charge of a technology company.
